045627c4-c320-44ad-af01-35261ffe8754.description: You can grant creatures affected by your air spells a glide speed.
045627c4-c320-44ad-af01-35261ffe8754.name: Light Feet II

requires.description: You can grant creatures affected by your air spells bonus movement, as though they had spent 2 more ticks.
requires.name: Light Feet I

07eb6f92-c4c1-4d89-8aa8-4476016bd639.description: Any creature that attacks your spells takes 1 HP of Slashing damage if they destroy the spell.
07eb6f92-c4c1-4d89-8aa8-4476016bd639.name: Shards

087e283b-1606-4c81-8184-3121b090780e.description: As Spreading Flames, but the range is now 5 times your proficiency bonus.
087e283b-1606-4c81-8184-3121b090780e.name: Spreading Flames II

requires.description: Whenever a creature ends its turn with a fire spell active on it, you can use your reaction to target a new creature within 5' of that creature with the spell.  This does not count as casting a spell
requires.name: Spreading Flames

0ec46954-2823-4391-834c-517dcab35091.description: If your Intelligence attack succeeds against a target’s Strength defense, you can knock them prone.
0ec46954-2823-4391-834c-517dcab35091.name: Buffet I

required_for.description: As Buffet, but you can also move the target a number of feet equal to 5 times your proficiency modifier.
required_for.name: Buffet II

0f316939-941c-4e39-8146-6cfd1aabdd15.description: Whenever you hit a creature with a slashing attack, if you surpass the AC of adjacent creatures, you can deal a glancing hit to them.
0f316939-941c-4e39-8146-6cfd1aabdd15.name: Dervish I

required_for.description: As Dervish, but the hits on adjacent creatures are full hits instead of glancing hits.
required_for.name: Dervish II

193e3faa-8633-48b7-8be8-b3dd163273c9.description: Your plant spells can spread.  Every time a time period one less than its total duration expires, it affects an adjacent space.
193e3faa-8633-48b7-8be8-b3dd163273c9.name: Plant Growth I

1e14a712-1238-4f10-84b1-ef671144fbc7.description: You can grant creatures affected by your air spells bonus movement, as though they had spent 2 more ticks.
1e14a712-1238-4f10-84b1-ef671144fbc7.name: Light Feet I

required_for.description: You can grant creatures affected by your air spells a glide speed.
required_for.name: Light Feet II

1f8b6c47-bf37-4a0c-a92e-2efae9d11cda.description: Even if someone disbelieves an illusion of yours, it's still present in their senses until dispelled.
1f8b6c47-bf37-4a0c-a92e-2efae9d11cda.name: Deep Reality

required_for.description: If someone disbelieves an illusion of yours, you can spend 5 ticks to recast it.
required_for.name: Phantasms

22da711c-35c4-42a7-b61e-ab215d895dec.description: Your Ice spells with restraining effects have advantage on spellcasting checks.  Whenever you affect a creature with an ice spell, its speed is cut in half if the spell beats its Constitution defense.
22da711c-35c4-42a7-b61e-ab215d895dec.name: Restraining Cold

requires.description: You have advantage on Power rolls when casting spells that immobilize.
requires.name: Freezing Joints

25cc3127-9052-4ba7-887c-635b0188ee0a.description: When you score a glancing hit with a piercing spell, you can inflict a point of damage (without rolling for an injury) without provoking opportunity attacks.
25cc3127-9052-4ba7-887c-635b0188ee0a.name: Glance Deep

requires.description: You score a glancing hit against a creature on a roll that equals 10 minus their AC, rather than 5 minus their AC.
requires.name: Constant Glancing

306322ba-3e43-4d6a-a501-933da1e76199.description: When you score a critical hit using a power with the slashing tag, you deal an additional point of damage.
306322ba-3e43-4d6a-a501-933da1e76199.name: Critical I

required_for.description: When you score a critical hit using a power with the slashing tag, you double your damage.
required_for.name: Critical II

364b7e7e-87a0-4dcf-ba8e-d8511c20576f.description: If the attack beats the target’s Composure Defence, they can’t take reactions until their next turn.
364b7e7e-87a0-4dcf-ba8e-d8511c20576f.name: No Reaction

required_for.description: If the attack beats the target’s Composure Defence, they can’t take reactions until their next turn, and can’t take the same action on their next turn they took on their previous turn
required_for.name: Mind Spike

3c2a81f9-07b3-4243-a2e9-a049738b0055.description: Critical hits with Air powers may affect one additional target, so long as the target is within 5* your Proficiency modifier feet of a standard target.
3c2a81f9-07b3-4243-a2e9-a049738b0055.name: Forking

requires.description: As Buffet, but you can also move the target a number of feet equal to 5 times your proficiency modifier.
requires.name: Buffet II

3ca8a61f-1423-470d-b6ac-a071246210a3.name: Freezing Joints

required_for.description: Creatures within 5 feet of a creature with a cold spell on it have their speed reduced to 5 feet.
required_for.name: Cold Aura

required_for.description: Your Ice spells with restraining effects have advantage on spellcasting checks.  Whenever you affect a creature with an ice spell, its speed is cut in half if the spell beats its Constitution defense.

3e75cad9-dd84-4ba5-a9be-71fd7438f979.name: Disarm

requires.description: If the attack beats the target’s Athletics Defence, you can push them back 5*proficiency modifier feet
requires.name: Bull Rush

579b4602-c0be-4876-968f-8e86f80db252.name: Acid Armor

697c84f2-2611-41e7-b294-4cbf12403bf5.name: Critical II

73b28001-60c5-473d-bee6-99e2f2e50e74.name: Lead the Way

80676dd2-73a6-4ad7-9b19-171a92d535d7.description: Creatures you have charmed treat you as the single most important person in their life.
80676dd2-73a6-4ad7-9b19-171a92d535d7.name: Fast Friends

98bc9623-1ff1-4ff4-80cd-eea0246ace1c.name: Prone

b3ef1778-2c00-4aca-9235-d41ae9c2de9d.description: Whenever a creature is killed by a fire spell you cast, you can make an attack against all creatures within 30' that targets their Composure defense.  If you succeed, they become afraid of you.
b3ef1778-2c00-4aca-9235-d41ae9c2de9d.name: Panic I

required_for.description: As Panic I, but you can make the attack whenever your fire spreads.
required_for.name: Panic II

b4e4035f-006e-4f92-a823-3ecfad91ed6f.description: Whenever you score a critical hit with a slashing spell, the target takes another point of damage at the start of your next turn.
b4e4035f-006e-4f92-a823-3ecfad91ed6f.name: Critical Bleeding

requires.description: Whenever you score a critical hit with a slashing spell, the target takes another point of damage at the start of your next turn.

required_for.name: Critical Bleeding

c807c50d-19bf-4e63-babb-d444e9f85144.description: When attempting to restrain a creature, you may attack its Dexterity defense.
c807c50d-19bf-4e63-babb-d444e9f85144.name: Constricting Thorns

requires.description: Whenever a creature attacks one of your plant spells, you can use your reaction to attack back, using your spell attack.  This can only generate injuries.
requires.name: Thorns

cec26ffb-889f-428d-ab03-5c663e3ca6a0.description: If the attack beats the target’s Insight Defence, attacks against the target have advantage until the end of your next turn
cec26ffb-889f-428d-ab03-5c663e3ca6a0.name: Attack Advantage

e926201e-3b63-4909-9062-2e278ee6679d.description: Creatures of your choice affected by your Earth Spells can't be knocked prone.
e926201e-3b63-4909-9062-2e278ee6679d.name: Stability

ecf0a5a7-927e-4b0d-936b-3da0c67d1ef8.description: You score a glancing hit against a creature on a roll that equals 10 minus their AC, rather than 5 minus their AC.

ef9fede8-b162-430b-bb65-8ae551b25cef.name: I Was Never Here

requires.name: Addictive Personality

f4f23651-acd4-48df-8153-da170179b17e.description: You can shape the terrain with your Earth spells. You can raise or lower the terrain of a number of spaces equal to your proficiency modifier by up to 5 times your Proficiency modifier feet. Any spaces in the area of your spells, or under the feet of someone affected by a spell of yours are eligible.
f4f23651-acd4-48df-8153-da170179b17e.name: Rising Earth

requires.description: As a bonus action on your turn, you can attempt a spellcasting attack vs STR to cause anyone affected by or in the area of an Earth Spell of yours to fall prone.
requires.name: Shaking Earth

f6e2c698-acca-4bd7-b1ff-3d7f82196fa7.description: Whenever you kill a creature with a fire spell, you can use your reaction to target another creature within a number of feet equal to 5 times your Proficiency modifier.  This does not count as casting a spell.
f6e2c698-acca-4bd7-b1ff-3d7f82196fa7.name: Lingering Flames

required_for.description: Whenever a creature ends its turn with a fire spell active on it, you can use your reaction to target a new creature within 5' of that creature with the spell.  This does not count as casting a spell
required_for.name: Spreading Flames

fb953d78-ff31-46d5-ac8b-09e2e0799a78.description: You can dispel your plant spell to allow every creature currently affected by it to spend a Hit Die.
fb953d78-ff31-46d5-ac8b-09e2e0799a78.name: Berries

You can raise or lower the terrain of a number of spaces equal to your proficiency modifier by up to 5 times your Proficiency modifier feet. Any spaces in the area of your spells, or under the feet of someone affected by a spell of yours are eligible.
required_for.name: Rising Earth
